Class VirtualArrays

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.vipr.client.core.AbstractResources<T>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ACLResources, BulkResources<VirtualArrayRestRep>, Resources<VirtualArrayRestRep>, TopLevelResources<VirtualArrayRestRep>

    public class VirtualArrays
extends AbstractCoreBulkResources<VirtualArrayRestRep>
implements TopLevelResources<VirtualArrayRestRep>, ACLResources
    Virtual Arrays resources.

    Base URL: /vdc/varrays
